meanings.sent1: In India, many people enjoy smoking durries.
meanings.sent2: I bought a pack of durries from the store.
meanings.sent3: The smell of durries filled the room, making everyone cough.
meanings.sent4: His pockets were always filled with durries, like a walking smoke shop.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packaging of the durries caught my eye immediately.

meanings.definition: A type of rug or carpet.
meanings.sent1: The durries in the living room added a cozy touch to the decor.
meanings.sent2: She loved to sit on the durries while reading her favorite book.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the durries were a perfect scratching post.
meanings.sent4: The durries on the floor felt like a soft cloud under my feet.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the durries told a story of tradition and culture.
